entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of thundershowers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 in the afternoon. High 26. Humidex 34. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 10.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then clearing. Risk of thundershowers early in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 in the evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
